## Data Preparation

```{r load-possums, include=FALSE}
# Load and preprocess data-set
  zip_path <- "../data/datasets.zip"
  file.exists(zip_path)
  possums <- read.csv(unz(zip_path, "possums.csv"))
  skimp   <- skim(possums) |>
  select(skim_variable, n_missing)
  skimp                           
  head(possums)    
```
